name: Skeleboi
text: In a comic, you know how you can tell who the arch-villain's going to be? He's the exact opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you and me!

name: Skelelad
text: You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind.

name: Skelelad
text: After the avalanche, it took us a week to climb out. Now, I don't know exactly when we turned on each other, but I know that seven of us survived the slide... and only five made it out.
